name: Tranquility RPG
description:
You did it. You beat the game. You're at max level. You have the best gear in game.

So, what now..?

Make peace. Travel back to the starting town. Meet old friends again. Or foes..? Tranquility RPG

This is not you're typical action roleplaying game. In Tranquility you level down. You travel back to home.

There is actually a bug in the submitted game that just loops the first level over and over again. There are actually two more levels and a final boss in the game. Game jams don't usually allow post-jam edits but here is a link to the final game as it was intended: https://morland.red/tranquility-rpg/ Also a GitHub page to show we are not lying, just the game is: https://github.com/SirMorland/reverse-arpg
